        Oprah's Favorite Things
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </li>
    <li aria-controls="submenu_entertainment" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Entertainment" class="new-sidepanel-menu-parent-item has-children" data-id="3" role="button" tabindex="0">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Oprah's Book Club
         </span>
        </h2>
        <div class="feed-block-subheading">
         Everything to know about her latest pick.
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="4e538aee-5926-4e02-9df6-5489b3525966" data-vars-block-slot="2" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item oprahs-book-club-pick-gilead-books-marilynne-robinson image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/books/a35840835/oprahs-book-club-pick-gilead-books-marilynne-robinson/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="oprah's book club" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/ow-bookstack-tw-1615824651.png?crop=0.563xw:1.00xh;0.220xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/books/a35840835/oprahs-book-club-pick-gilead-books-marilynne-robinson/">
            Oprah's New Book Club Pick: Marilynne Robinson
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item marilynne-robinson-gilead-excerpt-oprahs-book-club image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="2" href="/entertainment/books/a35841594/marilynne-robinson-gilead-excerpt-oprahs-book-club/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="marilynne robinson" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gilead-1615833040.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.498xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="2" href="/entertainment/books/a35841594/marilynne-robinson-gilead-excerpt-oprahs-book-club/">
            An Excerpt of Marilynne Robinson's Gilead
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item marilynne-robinson-author-books image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="3" href="/entertainment/books/a35840782/marilynne-robinson-author-books/">
           <img alt="paris, france   september 7  american writer marilynne robinson poses during a portrait session held on september 7, 2009 in paris, france photo by ulf andersengetty images" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-95852219-1615822515.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.166xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-95852219-1615822515.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.166xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-95852219-1615822515.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.166xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-95852219-1615822515.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.166xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/gettyimages-95852219-1615822515.jpg?crop=0.672xw:1.00xh;0.166xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Marilynne Robinson Portrait Session"/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="3" href="/entertainment/books/a35840782/marilynne-robinson-author-books/">
            All About Marilynne Robinson's "Gilead" Novels
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item oprah-book-club-list image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="4" href="/entertainment/books/g23067476/oprah-book-club-list/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="People in nature, Yellow, Canidae, Dog, Companion dog, Leaf, Puppy, Fawn, Adaptation, Happy, " class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprahreading-1539017147.png?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.282xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="People in nature, Yellow, Canidae, Dog, Companion dog, Leaf, Puppy, Fawn, Adaptation, Happy, "/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="4" href="/entertainment/books/g23067476/oprah-book-club-list/">

      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Amazing Grace
         </span>
        </h2>
        <div class="feed-block-subheading">
         With a viral pandemic, racial reckoning, and civil unrest, we turned to elders who have endured all this and more.
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="32fcdbc9-102f-4b34-a898-5f5a6c42baf7" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item grandfather-enslaved-perspective image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">

        <div class="custom-item polio-preparation-coronavirus image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Amazing Grace" data-vars-position="4" href="/life/health/a34701493/polio-preparation-coronavirus/">
           <img alt="mary alice tully elias polio survivor collage" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/opr120120wellpackage-0010-1605636140.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.881xh;0,0.0367xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/opr120120wellpackage-0010-1605636140.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.881xh;0,0.0367xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/opr120120wellpackage-0010-1605636140.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.881xh;0,0.0367xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/opr120120wellpackage-0010-1605636140.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.881xh;0,0.0367xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/opr120120wellpackage-0010-1605636140.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.881xh;0,0.0367xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>

         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Long Reads" data-vars-position="2" href="/life/relationships-love/a34349057/husband-clothes-grief-essay-rachel-zimmerman/">

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story-feed" data-block-template="big-story-feed">
      <div class="feed-block-inner">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <span>
          Oprah's Book Club
         </span>
        </h2>
        <div class="feed-block-subheading">
         Everything to know about her latest pick.
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="featured-item" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="89aa2ba8-894c-4adb-8245-ba3d5456c423" data-vars-block-slot="15" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">
        <div class="custom-item oprahs-book-club-pick-caste-isabel-wilkerson column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/books/a33482532/oprahs-book-club-pick-caste-isabel-wilkerson/">
           <picture class="">
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprah-caste-1596660355.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=1120:*" media="(min-width: 73.75rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprah-caste-1596660355.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=1024:*" media="(min-width: 64rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprah-caste-1596660355.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=980:*" media="(min-width: 61.25rem)"/>
            <source data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/oprah-caste-1596660355.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=720:*" media="(min-width: 40.625rem)"/>

           </picture>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Oprah's Book Club" data-vars-position="1" href="/entertainment/books/a33482532/oprahs-book-club-pick-caste-isabel-wilkerson/">

           </a>

           <img alt="Face, Facial expression, Glasses, Eyewear, Head, Smile, Human, Fun, Photography, Laugh, " class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/grey-hair-shampoo-1571669434.png?crop=0.500xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/grey-hair-shampoo-1571669434.png?crop=0.500xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/grey-hair-shampoo-1571669434.png?crop=0.500xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/grey-hair-shampoo-1571669434.png?crop=0.500xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/grey-hair-shampoo-1571669434.png?crop=0.500xw:1.00xh;0.250xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Face, Facial expression, Glasses, Eyewear, Head, Smile, Human, Fun, Photography, Laugh, "/>

           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>
           <img alt="slp" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/screen-shot-2021-03-04-at-10-50-55-am-1614873074.png?crop=0.647xw:1.00xh;0.0543xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/oprahmagazine/assets/css/homepage.c7f3c3c.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/oprahmagazine/assets/css/homepage-mobile.0bb583b.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
